Libraries & load TSE

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(mia)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
tse <- readRDS("results/tse_itsall.rds")
```

```{r}
rowData(tse)$seq_length <- nchar(as.character(referenceSeq(tse)))
```

Filtering seq over 800 bp

```{r}
tse <- tse[rowData(tse)$seq_length >=800,]
dim(tse)
```

\newpage

```{r}
kable(rowData(tse), booktabs=T, longtable=T) %>%
    kable_styling(latex_options=c("striped", "repeat_header"),
                  font_size=6) %>% row_spec(0, color="white", background="teal")
    
```
